amendment.description: To recognize the sacrifices of the members of the Armed Forces who are injured in combat.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3264 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3264 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Pryor. (consideration: CR S7152-7160) To recognize the sacrifices of the members of the Armed Forces who are injured in combat.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3264 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3264 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Pryor.
